Notes.Text:
This update for pgadmin4 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-9636: Fixed Cross-Origin Opener Policy (COOP) vulnerability (bsc#1249151).

Vulnerabilities.Description: pgAdmin <= 9.7 is affected by a  Cross-Origin Opener Policy (COOP) vulnerability.  This vulnerability allows an attacker to manipulate the OAuth flow,  potentially leading to unauthorised account access, account takeover, data breaches, and privilege escalation.
